definition: to resist/to obstruct/to hinder/to keep off/to block (a blow)/to get in the way of/cover/gear (e.g. in a car's transmission)
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
to resist/to hold back/to stop/to ward off/to withstand
see 勢不可當|势不可当[shi4 bu4 ke3 dang1]
to resist/to obstruct/to bear responsibility for

sentences.english: Tessai is shock that Aizen could stop his attack but the three are gone.
sentences.chinese: 铁斋惊讶蓝染能挡下自己的攻击，三人组离开。

sentences.english: If I attack you like this, how would you defend me?
sentences.chinese: 如果我咁样攻击你，你会点样挡隔？

sentences.english: Someone had changed the password and locked him out of his own e-mail system.
sentences.chinese: 有人修改了密码，将他挡在了自家的邮件系统之外。

sentences.english: The goalkeeper just managed to palm the ball over the crossbar.
sentences.chinese: 守门员用手掌勉强把球挡过球门横木。

sentences.english: In the dim light of the daybreak, I saw a dark shape looming athwart the door.
sentences.chinese: 在拂晓前昏暗的光线中，我看到一个黑影挡在门口。

sentences.english: You cut off gravel trucks and those blue Varica trucks.
sentences.chinese: 你会挡在砂石车和蓝色威利小货卡前面。

sentences.english: Suddenly, , the rice cake fell out of the basin and stopped beside a big rock.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，米糕从木盆中掉了出来，被一块大石头挡着。

sentences.english: The Bicycle got in the way of the Backing car.
sentences.chinese: 自行车挡到要倒退的车。

sentences.english: The cutting blade is fixed on the cutter body through the pressing block and the baffle and is more convenient to replace.
sentences.chinese: 刀片通过压块及挡圈固定在刀体上，更换比较方便。

sentences.english: Move out of the way, please, I can't see through you.
sentences.chinese: 请借光，你挡着我就看不见了。

sentences.english: They built a wall round the shore of the lake to retain the water.
sentences.chinese: 他们沿着湖边筑起一道堤来挡水。

sentences.english: Therefore gear-shape engagement is made between the end surface of interior ring of bearing and baffle ring.
sentences.chinese: 为此将轴承内圈端面与挡圈之间制成齿状啮合。

sentences.english: The ducks scattered, leaving two snapping turtles in his path.
sentences.chinese: 鸭子们都四散开去，恰好有两只大乌龟挡在那里。

sentences.english: Why so painful wounds, but also used to block sharp pain.
sentences.chinese: 为什么伤口那么痛，还要拿来挡锐利的伤悲。

sentences.english: Godric Who are you and what are you doing here , blocking the highways of the Griffin Empire?
sentences.chinese: 哥德里克你是谁，为什么挡在狮鹫帝国公路的中间？

sentences.english: Press the lever until you hear the catch engage.
sentences.chinese: 压下挡杆，直到听到挡挂好。

definition: to block sb's path/to obstruct/to flag down (a taxi)
to get out of the way
to resist/to hold back/to stop/to ward off/to withstand
to open up a path/to make one's way through/to construct a road/(electricity) open circuit
to get out of the way/to step aside

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
to stay out of (hot water, trouble, awkward situation etc)/to avoid (sb)
to knock against/to bump into/to run into/to meet by accident
